name: url-parser
description: Parse URLs into components (protocol, host, path, query params) or build URLs from parts. Useful for API work, redirects, and link manipulation.
author: SPARK

endpoints.description: Parse a URL into its components

output.params: object - Query parameters as key-value pairs

input.base: string - Base URL (optional if protocol+host provided)

endpoints.description: Extract just the query parameters from a URL

input.url: string - The URL to extract params from

output.params: object - Query parameters as key-value pairs

endpoints.description: Add or update query parameters on a URL
